title: 11 Fall-Ready Cargo Pants For Any Occasion
description: We know fall just started, but if you (like us) are more than ready to get a head start on embracing some of the season's biggest street style trends, we recommend stocking up on a few styles now before they sell out - and trust us, if TikTok has anything to do with it, they will sell out. One of our favorite fall fashion trends is the return of nostalgic, '90s fashion - think platform shoes, fringe jackets, low-rise bottoms, and, our newest obsession, cargo pants. Love 'em or hate 'em, cargo pants are proving to be one of the most versatile fall trends. If you're tempted to experiment with the style for yourself, you can shop our picks of the best cargo pants for women just ahead. Styling these pants is actually pretty easy - hence why seemingly every celebrity and fashion editor has already added the silhouette to their wardrobe this season. They look great with T-shirts and crop tops, or even an oversize button-down shirt. Whether you're looking for something colorful and eye-catching or more muted and neutral, there's a pair of women's cargo pants you're bound to become obsessed with this fall. Our standout picks include (but aren't limited to) a pair of denim cargo pants that are elevated and polished, satin cargo pants, and even high-waisted cargo pants that come from some of our favorite brands like Nordstrom, Amazon, and more. Keep reading to shop our top picks for the best baggy cargo pants and get excited to spruce up your closet for the new season. Related: 10 Wear-Anywhere Cardigans Perfect For Fall
author: Kyley Warren
text: Skip to main contentWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.We know fall just started, but if you (like us) are more than ready to get a head start on embracing some of the season's biggest street style trends, we recommend stocking up on a few styles now before they sell out — and trust us, if TikTok has anything to do with it, they will sell out. One of our favorite fall fashion trends is the return of nostalgic, '90s fashion — think platform shoes, fringe jackets, low-rise bottoms, and, our newest obsession, cargo pants. Love 'em or hate 'em, cargo pants are proving to be one of the most versatile fall trends. If you're tempted to experiment with the style for yourself, you can shop our picks of the best cargo pants for women just ahead. Styling these pants is actually pretty easy — hence why seemingly every celebrity and fashion editor has already added the silhouette to their wardrobe this season. They look great with T-shirts and crop tops, or even an oversize button-down shirt. Whether you're looking for something colorful and eye-catching or more muted and neutral, there's a pair of women's cargo pants you're bound to become obsessed with this fall. Our standout picks include (but aren't limited to) a pair of denim cargo pants that are elevated and polished, satin cargo pants, and even high-waisted cargo pants that come from some of our favorite brands like Nordstrom, Amazon, and more. Keep reading to shop our top picks for the best baggy cargo pants and get excited to spruce up your closet for the new season. amazon.comBest Cargo Pants on AmazonTwiinSisters Jogger Camo Pants ($25-$37) Perhaps unsurprisingly, Amazon is home to a lot of affordable cargo pants that come in all different shapes, sizes, and colors — though we're partial to these jogger-style cargo pants in particular. The fitted bottoms are a fun departure from the usual baggy silhouettes we tend to associate with cargo pants, as they feature a more flattering and tailored design. Plus, they're a bestseller for the retailer and boast more than 7,000 near-perfect ratings.pacsun.comBest Cargo Pants With PocketsLA Hearts Nylon Cargo Pants ($26, originally $53) When we think of retro cargo pants, we think of something like these nylon cargo pants from PacSun. The bottoms pay homage to classic '90s fashion, and we're loving the wide leg and lower rise silhouette — both of which are also trending this season. Best of all, they've got a bit of elastic at the back of the waist, so they're a comfortable pair that's perfect for all-day wear.amazon.comBest Denim Cargo Pants Zmpissa High-Waisted Cargo Pants ($40-$43) These are a must have for anyone who loves denim and cargo, and doesn't want to sacrifice one for the other. Pair these with a graphic tee and sneakers for a relaxed weekend look, or throw on a blazer and heels for a chic, work-ready outfit.nordstrom.comBest High-Waisted Cargo PantsBP. Cargo Pants ($45, originally $60) Low-rise styles might have dominated '90s fashion, but these green cargo pants prove that the bottoms are just as cool in a high-waisted silhouette. We love that the bottoms have a more fitted design up top teamed with a baggier, lived-in design on the bottom. Plus, the light olive green coloring will make such a fresh addition to your fall color palette.zara.comBest Satin Cargo PantsZara Satin Effect Cargo Pants ($50) Zendaya famously wore a pair of white silk cargo pants for a late night talk show appearance — so, naturally, we now want a pair of glossy cargo pants in our life, too. While her pant style isn't too easy to come by, these satin-effect cargo pants come pretty close in drape and look — plus they even feature a cool, pleated detailing on the leg.nordstrom.comBest Khaki Cargo Pants Nordstrom Stretch Cotton Cargo Pants ($54-$65, originally $119) If you prefer a more refined look that still pays homage to the effortlessness of other '90s cargo pants, get this khaki brown style from Nordstrom. The stylish pant is a contemporary take on the '90s cargo pant with its structured, tailored silhouette. This cargo pant also has pockets galore (we love that), and it's a versatile piece you can dress up or down for the ultimate cool girl look.eloquii.comBest Plus Size Work Cargo Pants Eloquii The Hudson Cargo Pant ($63, originally $105) Are they trousers? Are they cargo pants? With this straight-leg style from Eloquii, it's honestly hard to tell — which is precisely why we like them. Cargo pants might have a reputation for their relaxed and slouchy fit, but some styles are designed with your workwear needs in mind — just like these fitted bottoms. The straight-leg cargo pant has a more sophisticated design that's elevated by practical side pockets, a fitted silhouette, and standout colors.nordstrom.comBest Workout-and-Beyond Cargo Pants Beyond Yoga City Chic Cargo Pants ($118) And easy pull-on pant that takes you from your workout to daily errands seamlessly, you'll want to wear these green cargo pants on repeat this season. The straight leg looks great with lots of different shoe pairings, from booties to sneakers, and we're into these pants with a white crop top or cozy cardigan.goodamerican.comBest Low-Rise Cargo PantsGood American Parachute Pants ($139) These green cargo pants are exactly what we imagine when we think of styles from the '90s and early 2000s. The deep green color is a great option for year-round wear, and the low rise combined with a more elastic waist makes them easy to wear every day. Pair them with a cute crop top or a classic tank and oversize button-down.shopbop.comBest Baggy Cargo PantsTibi Crispy Nylon Pleated Cargo Pants ($395) If you're looking to make more of a statement, these baggy cargo pants are so chic. We love the lightweight nylon and think that these bottoms are perfect for dressing up or down — especially if you're in the market for something that can take you day to night, from the office to post-work cocktails and beyond. Pair them with classic flat sandals or heeled booties and a neutral-colored top for a look that'll really pop.- Additional reporting by India Yaffe and Natasha MarshKyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.India Yaffe India Yaffe was an associate editor on the Shopping team at PS for five years. She focused on curating the best fitness, fashion, beauty, and home products on the market for the PS audience.Natasha Marsh is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
html:
Skip to main content

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

We know fall just started, but if you (like us) are more than ready to get a head start on embracing some of the season's biggest street style trends, we recommend stocking up on a few styles now before they sell out — and trust us, if TikTok has anything to do with it, they will sell out. One of our favorite fall fashion trends is the return of nostalgic, '90s fashion — think platform shoes, fringe jackets, low-rise bottoms, and, our newest obsession, cargo pants.

Love 'em or hate 'em, cargo pants are proving to be one of the most versatile fall trends. If you're tempted to experiment with the style for yourself, you can shop our picks of the best cargo pants for women just ahead. Styling these pants is actually pretty easy — hence why seemingly every celebrity and fashion editor has already added the silhouette to their wardrobe this season. They look great with T-shirts and crop tops, or even an oversize button-down shirt.

Whether you're looking for something colorful and eye-catching or more muted and neutral, there's a pair of women's cargo pants you're bound to become obsessed with this fall. Our standout picks include (but aren't limited to) a pair of denim cargo pants that are elevated and polished, satin cargo pants, and even high-waisted cargo pants that come from some of our favorite brands like Nordstrom, Amazon, and more. Keep reading to shop our top picks for the best baggy cargo pants and get excited to spruce up your closet for the new season.

Best Cargo Pants on Amazon

TwiinSisters Jogger Camo Pants ($25-$37)

Perhaps unsurprisingly, Amazon is home to a lot of affordable cargo pants that come in all different shapes, sizes, and colors — though we're partial to these jogger-style cargo pants in particular. The fitted bottoms are a fun departure from the usual baggy silhouettes we tend to associate with cargo pants, as they feature a more flattering and tailored design. Plus, they're a bestseller for the retailer and boast more than 7,000 near-perfect ratings.

Best Cargo Pants With Pockets

LA Hearts Nylon Cargo Pants ($26, originally $53)

When we think of retro cargo pants, we think of something like these nylon cargo pants from PacSun. The bottoms pay homage to classic '90s fashion, and we're loving the wide leg and lower rise silhouette — both of which are also trending this season. Best of all, they've got a bit of elastic at the back of the waist, so they're a comfortable pair that's perfect for all-day wear.

Best Denim Cargo Pants

Zmpissa High-Waisted Cargo Pants ($40-$43)

These are a must have for anyone who loves denim and cargo, and doesn't want to sacrifice one for the other. Pair these with a graphic tee and sneakers for a relaxed weekend look, or throw on a blazer and heels for a chic, work-ready outfit.

Best High-Waisted Cargo Pants

BP. Cargo Pants ($45, originally $60)

Low-rise styles might have dominated '90s fashion, but these green cargo pants prove that the bottoms are just as cool in a high-waisted silhouette. We love that the bottoms have a more fitted design up top teamed with a baggier, lived-in design on the bottom. Plus, the light olive green coloring will make such a fresh addition to your fall color palette.

Best Satin Cargo Pants

Zara Satin Effect Cargo Pants ($50)

Zendaya famously wore a pair of white silk cargo pants for a late night talk show appearance — so, naturally, we now want a pair of glossy cargo pants in our life, too. While her pant style isn't too easy to come by, these satin-effect cargo pants come pretty close in drape and look — plus they even feature a cool, pleated detailing on the leg.

Best Khaki Cargo Pants

Nordstrom Stretch Cotton Cargo Pants ($54-$65, originally $119)

If you prefer a more refined look that still pays homage to the effortlessness of other '90s cargo pants, get this khaki brown style from Nordstrom. The stylish pant is a contemporary take on the '90s cargo pant with its structured, tailored silhouette. This cargo pant also has pockets galore (we love that), and it's a versatile piece you can dress up or down for the ultimate cool girl look.

Best Plus Size Work Cargo Pants

Eloquii The Hudson Cargo Pant ($63, originally $105)

Are they trousers? Are they cargo pants? With this straight-leg style from Eloquii, it's honestly hard to tell — which is precisely why we like them. Cargo pants might have a reputation for their relaxed and slouchy fit, but some styles are designed with your workwear needs in mind — just like these fitted bottoms. The straight-leg cargo pant has a more sophisticated design that's elevated by practical side pockets, a fitted silhouette, and standout colors.

Best Workout-and-Beyond Cargo Pants

Beyond Yoga City Chic Cargo Pants ($118)

And easy pull-on pant that takes you from your workout to daily errands seamlessly, you'll want to wear these green cargo pants on repeat this season. The straight leg looks great with lots of different shoe pairings, from booties to sneakers, and we're into these pants with a white crop top or cozy cardigan.

Best Low-Rise Cargo Pants

Good American Parachute Pants ($139)

These green cargo pants are exactly what we imagine when we think of styles from the '90s and early 2000s. The deep green color is a great option for year-round wear, and the low rise combined with a more elastic waist makes them easy to wear every day. Pair them with a cute crop top or a classic tank and oversize button-down.

Best Baggy Cargo Pants

Tibi Crispy Nylon Pleated Cargo Pants ($395)

If you're looking to make more of a statement, these baggy cargo pants are so chic. We love the lightweight nylon and think that these bottoms are perfect for dressing up or down — especially if you're in the market for something that can take you day to night, from the office to post-work cocktails and beyond. Pair them with classic flat sandals or heeled booties and a neutral-colored top for a look that'll really pop.

- Additional reporting by India Yaffe and Natasha Marsh

Kyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

India Yaffe India Yaffe was an associate editor on the Shopping team at PS for five years. She focused on curating the best fitness, fashion, beauty, and home products on the market for the PS audience.

Natasha Marsh is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
